com.dougnoel.sentinel.apis

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dougnoel.sentinel.apis.Action
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GET, POST, PUT

    public abstract class Action
extends Object
    An abstract class that defines an action for an API object. Implemented by GET, PUT, and POST concrete classes. For sending a request and receiving a response. Actual requests and responses are stored in Request and Response object collections.
    Author:
    Doug Noël

    • Method Detail

      • getURI

        public String getURI(URL url)
        Returns a URL as a String with the endpoint attached.
        Parameters:
        url - java.net.URL URL of the API
        Returns:
        String the URL with the Action's endpoint attached.

      • sendRequest

        public abstract Response sendRequest(Request request,
                                     API api)
                              throws org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException,
                                     IOException,
                                     URISyntaxException
        Returns a response from a given api using a given request.
        Parameters:
        request - Request the Sentinel Request object to create and send the request
        api - API the Sentinel API object to make a call against, which contains the URL to use
        Returns:
        Response the Sentinel Response object returned for evaluation
        Throws:
        org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException - if the HttpClient execution fails
        IOException - if the HttpClient execution fails or reading the response IOStream fails
        URISyntaxException - if building the URI fails
